title: Permanent hardcoded admin initialization fix - Frontend changes

requirements.summary: Remove the useBootstrapAdmin hook from the frontend
acceptanceCriteria: The useBootstrapAdmin hook file or export no longer exists
No references to useBootstrapAdmin remain in the codebase

file_operations.description: Delete the useBootstrapAdmin hook file entirely since bootstrap logic is being moved to automatic backend initialization

requirements.summary: Remove bootstrap logic from AppLayout.tsx while keeping the sidebar and all UI exactly as v41
acceptanceCriteria: No bootstrap-related code or useBootstrapAdmin calls exist in AppLayout.tsx
Sidebar navigation remains unchanged from v41
User profile display with dynamic role badge remains unchanged
Layout and UI structure match v41 exactly

file_operations.description: Remove the useBootstrapAdmin import and all bootstrap-related logic including the automatic bootstrapAdmin() call that executes when an authenticated user has no admin entry. Keep all existing UI elements unchanged: sidebar navigation, user profile display with dynamic role badge (Admin/Staff/User), logout functionality, and layout structure. The component should continue to fetch and display the user's admin entry via useGetMyAdminEntry but without any bootstrap fallback logic.

requirements.summary: Update the version number displayed in the AppLayout footer from 'v41' to 'v42'
acceptanceCriteria: Version string is visible in the AppLayout component

file_operations.description: Update the version string in the footer from 'v41' to 'v42' to reflect the new release version
